name: Enchanter (itch)
description:
Enchanter is a 2D-Typing game where you play a powerful Enchanter trying to 'spell' your way out of certain doom at the hands of a mysterious evil entity known as the Qareen. Type your way to glory in this short but sweet typing adventure.

Credits 

Wong Zian Yi (Lead Designer)
Wong Kar Chun (Designer)
Thianchai Phromsuwam (Programmer)
Andrew Corban (Programmer)
Lee Choon Meng (Programmer)
Leim Kheng Wei (Programmer)
Sean Chan (Artist)

Produced as part of a student assignment Bachelor of Game Development (Hons) KDU University College - Glenmarie Games Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/kdugamedevelopment  Website: http://gamedev.kdu.edu.my
